title: How to Add an External Application to TetherPro

steps.headline: Go to File  and select the option called "Options" and then select the SendTo tab.
Navigate to where your program is and then select it.
steps.description: If you can't find it, then find the shortcut for the software and look up the properties. It should tell you where it is.

steps.headline: Place a tick mark in the box that you want your image to open with.
steps.description: If you check multiple boxes, it will open up in multiple software products.

text: Go to File  and select the option called "Options" and then select the SendTo tab.  Select Add.  Navigate to where your program is and then select it. If you can't find it, then find the shortcut for the software and look up the properties. It should tell you where it is. Place a tick mark in the box that you want your image to open with. If you check multiple boxes, it will open up in multiple software products. Finished.
